QuestData.Title: My Word is My Bond
QuestData.Description: It would seem that we have no choice.$b$bAs reluctant as I am to cooperate with the Kolkar, there is wisdom in the words of their Khan.$b$bYou may give him my word that we shall lend our spears to the battle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Khan Kammah wants you to speak to Khan Leh'prah.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $c.$b$bNow we must convince the Gelkis...
